statements.select: SELECT a.id, a.uCode as account, a.longitude, a.latitude, b.uName as name, b.dName as dept, b.groupid, b.groupName, b.devicetype, b.status FROM tbuserimdatas a inner join tbusers b on a.uCode = b.uCode WHERE (a.uCode like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.uName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.dName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.groupName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')) and b.isDel = 0 and b.status <> "禁用" LIMIT #page#, #pageSize#

SELECT count(*) FROM tbuserimdatas a inner join tbusers b on a.uCode = b.uCode WHERE (a.uCode like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.uName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.dName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%') or b.groupName like CONCAT('%',#name#,'%')) and b.isDel = 0 and b.status <> "禁用"
statements.insert: INSERT INTO tbuserimdatas(uCode, type, longitude, latitude, LastModifyTime) VALUES (#account#, #type#, #longtitude#, #latitude#, #updatetime#)
statements.update: UPDATE tbusers SET status = #status# WHERE uCode = #account# AND devicetype = 'PDT'
UPDATE tbusers SET groupid = #groupid#, groupName = (select discussionName from tbdiscussiongroups where discussionCode = #groupid# and type = 'PDT') WHERE uCode = #account# AND devicetype = 'PDT'
statements.delete: DELETE FROM tbdiscussiongroups WHERE discussionCode = #groupId# and type = 'PDT'
statements.insert: INSERT INTO tbdepartments (dCode, dName, dFather, farther, sort_id, createtime, updatetime) VALUES (#unitCode#,#unitName#,#parentUnitCode#,#parentUnitName#,99,now(),now())
